ComicInfo.Penciller: Gil Kane,Jack Keller,Gil Evans,Jack Keller,Gil Evans
ComicInfo.Title: Rampage!; Prairie Smoke!; The Burning Sands!; Rustlers' Moon!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Rampage!: Kid Colt is bushwacked by Shag Marcy and his gang.
Prairie Smoke!: Kid Colt tries to make peace between ranchers and farmers who both want a piece of the land.
The Burning Sands!: Cabe risks traveling across the desert to escape from a posse on his trail.
Rustlers' Moon!: Kid Colt takes down Duke Costa who is running the town.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
